text: akasannalum bhumiyum srsticca divasam allahu rekhappetuttiyatanusaricc allahuvinre atukkal masannalute ennam pantrantakunnu. avayil nalennam (yud'dham) vilakkappettamasannalakunnu. atan vakratayillatta matam. atinal a (nalâ€Œ) masannalil ninnal ninnaleat tanne akramam pravarttikkarutâ€Œ. bahudaivavisvasikal ninnaleat akamanam yud'dham ceyyunnat peale ninnal avareatum akamanam yud'dham ceyyuka. allahu suksmata palikkunnavarute kuteyanenn ninnal manas'silakkukayum ceyyuka
